procedure.title: Making Tweaks in Bootstrap Instead of Modifying the CSS

step.para: Go to http://flatuicolors.com/ to get the 3 byte HTML color codes
Use $ signs instead of @ signs when customizing varibles in this file. For example: $body-bg: #bdc3c7;
For the complete list of customizations, go to: http://getbootstrap.com/customize/ and follow the coding convention noted in the file.
